docs.title: CaribData Open Data — Caribbean
docs.text:
This micro-site lists a few example datasets pulled from openly available internet sources.

The data are mostly pulled from the World Bank and the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) open data repositories. All data sources are extracted automatically, with a weekly check made for data source updates.

Data have been extracted for each our four partner countries:

  • Belize (BZ),
  • Guyana (GY).
  • Jamaica (JM), and
  • Trinidad & Tobago (TT).

A full list of extracted datasets is maintained in catalog.yml.

docs.title: Data
docs.text:
• World Bank per-country CSVs under data/world_bank/<ISO2>/
  • FAOSTAT Food and Balance Sheets per-country CSVs under data/faostat_fbs/
  • Selected 'messy' datasets for Belize under data/messy/

docs.title: Associated files
docs.text: Several information files have been created: - Brief variable-level data dictionary for the extracted World Bank files: data/world_bank/_dictionary.csv - Manifests, providing basic extraction metadata: data/world_bank/_manifest.json, data/faostat_fbs/_manifest.json - An example quality report, listing percent completeness for each extracted indicator: data/_quality_report.json|csv

docs.title: Repository
docs.text: The full data package as a .zip file - containing all datasets - is available via versioned repository releases.

docs.title: Website download
docs.text: Individual datasets can be downloaded from this website - via the download page.

docs.title: FAOSTAT FBS CSVs
docs.text:
• BLZ_fbs.csv — FAOSTAT Food Balance Sheets (BLZ)
  • GUY_fbs.csv — FAOSTAT Food Balance Sheets (GUY)
  • JAM_fbs.csv — FAOSTAT Food Balance Sheets (JAM)
  • TTO_fbs.csv — FAOSTAT Food Balance Sheets (TTO)

docs.title: Run locally
docs.text: ```bash pip install -r requirements.txt python scripts/build_wb_fwo.py python scripts/generate_quality_report.py

docs.title: Messy Data (Belize)
docs.text:
This repository includes a small bundle of intentionally messy public datasets from Belize to test ingest and cleaning.

  • Source list lives in catalog.yml under messy.items.
  • The workflow CaribData Messy Data — Fetch & Bundle builds:
  • data/messy/_bundle.zip (all raw files)
  • data/messy/_manifest.json (file metadata)
  • data/messy/_report.json (heuristics: sheets, merged cells, header guesses)

Tip: Download the latest artifact named messy-bundle from the workflow run to inspect the ZIP and metadata.
